name: Pacifist War
description:
A war is ongoing between two fleets, and as a true pacifist, you will be interfering in the battle with your powerful barrier to stop them from destroying each other.

This game was made for 3 different game jams. The theme/restrictions for each were as following:

-Mini Jam 87: Break(Optional, didn't follow), The Player Is A Pacifist(The player is a pacifist, trying to stop a war.)

-Kenney Jam 2021: Rotation(The player keeps rotating between two tasks: protecting the red fleet and protecting the blue fleet.)

-Trijam #134: We're heading for a disaster(You can prolong the killing, but the game can't go on forever - ultimately, it is impossible to stop the war.)

Controls

Movement: A, D or Arrow Keys

Roll back to center : Space Bar

How To Play

Move left and right to block the bullets with your barrier. Make sure no ships on either side get blown up.
